Player History
Drafted in 6th round, 87th overall pick, by Brooklyn in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Andrew Hutzler (NY)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/20/2015, off Ramon Cobas (BOS)...
Traded from Brooklyn to Cincinnati on 6/10/2016 (Going to BRO: P Marion Tobler, P Ryan Boston, P Dalton Tennison, P Bernard Coloma, 3B Fede Alfaro. Going to CIN: RF Jeffrey Corum, 3B John Losey,
CF Michael Turner)...
Traded from Cincinnati to New York on 2/3/2017 (Going to NY: 3B John Losey. Going to CIN: 1B Frederick Wansley, P Imotoku Kyoden, RF Jose Flores)...
Injured on 4/26/2017 with a Bruised Wrist, out for one week...
Was claimed off waivers by Seattle on 8/15/2017.
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 2/12/2018 to a 2-year deal worth $1,050,000 per year...
Traded from Cincinnati to San Francisco on 3/2/2019 (Going to SF: 2B John Losey, P Deangelo Barragan, 1B Raul Rivera, P George Mundell. Going to CIN: SS Wayne Weaver, C Kenneth Opitz)...
Injured on 4/20/2019 with a Torn Ligament Elbow, out for full season...
9/26/2019: Signed a contract extension with San Francisco, $1,000,000 per year, for 1 years.
